feed.title: WhoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.39.0 - Support for multiple Redis databases, UI card filter
entry.content:
• [Feature] Add support for multiple Redis databases
  • [Feature] Add filter in the storage units
  • [Feature] Adding Deployment version on the sidebar
  • [Bug fix] Fix filter conditions
  • [Bug fix] Sorting issue in Postgres Views
  • [Improvement] Modify server port release
  • Bumping up the following libraries
    • [frontend] tailwindcss
    • [core] gqlgen
    • [core] gqlparser
    • [frontend] framer motion
    • [frontend] @types/node
    • [frontend] @types/react
    • [core] mongo-driver
    • [core] monaco editor

What's Changed

  • fix small filter bug + add contact form option by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/184
  • modify how the server starts + stops as to allow for better flexibility in releasing resources by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/185
  • build(deps): bump @types/node from 22.5.4 to 22.7.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/183
  • build(deps): bump framer-motion from 11.5.4 to 11.9.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/182
  • build(deps): bump @types/react from 18.3.5 to 18.3.10 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/181
  • build(deps): bump github.com/vektah/gqlparser/v2 from 2.5.16 to 2.5.17 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/180
  • build(deps-dev): bump tailwindcss from 3.4.11 to 3.4.13 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/170
  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.51 to 0.17.54 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/167
  • build(deps): bump monaco-editor from 0.51.0 to 0.52.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/164
  • build(deps): bump go.mongodb.org/mongo-driver from 1.16.1 to 1.17.0 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/162
  • build(deps): bump @types/react from 18.3.10 to 18.3.12 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/210
  • build(deps-dev): bump @types/lodash from 4.17.7 to 4.17.12 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/209
  • build(deps): bump github.com/vektah/gqlparser/v2 from 2.5.17 to 2.5.18 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/207
  • build(deps): bump framer-motion from 11.9.0 to 11.11.9 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/206
  • build(deps): bump tailwind-merge from 2.5.2 to 2.5.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/205
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/typescript from 4.0.9 to 4.1.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/201
  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.54 to 0.17.55 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/194
  • add tentative highlight metrics + setting screen by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/187
  • build(deps): bump @testing-library/jest-dom from 6.5.0 to 6.6.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/217
  • build(deps): bump framer-motion from 11.11.9 to 11.11.10 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/216
  • build(deps): bump @types/jest from 29.5.13 to 29.5.14 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/215
  • build(deps): bump @reduxjs/toolkit from 2.2.7 to 2.3.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/214
  • build(deps): bump @types/node from 22.7.4 to 22.8.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/218
  • build(deps): bump go.mongodb.org/mongo-driver from 1.17.0 to 1.17.1 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/190

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.38.0...0.39.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.40.0 - Add database configuration for MySQL and Postgres
entry.content:
• Add support for extending database configuration for both MySQL and Postgres (with default GORM syntax)
  • Add support for MySQL host path
  • Add support for default schema to be initialized using login profiles

What's Changed

  • fix small filter bug + add contact form option by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/184
  • modify how the server starts + stops as to allow for better flexibility in releasing resources by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/185
  • build(deps): bump @types/node from 22.5.4 to 22.7.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/183
  • build(deps): bump framer-motion from 11.5.4 to 11.9.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/182

  • build(deps): bump monaco-editor from 0.51.0 to 0.52.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/164
  • build(deps): bump go.mongodb.org/mongo-driver from 1.16.1 to 1.17.0 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/162
  • build(deps): bump @types/react from 18.3.10 to 18.3.12 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/210
  • build(deps-dev): bump @types/lodash from 4.17.7 to 4.17.12 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/209
  • build(deps): bump github.com/vektah/gqlparser/v2 from 2.5.17 to 2.5.18 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/207
  • build(deps): bump framer-motion from 11.9.0 to 11.11.9 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/206
  • build(deps): bump tailwind-merge from 2.5.2 to 2.5.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/205
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/typescript from 4.0.9 to 4.1.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/201
  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.54 to 0.17.55 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/194
  • add tentative highlight metrics + setting screen by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/187
  • build(deps): bump @testing-library/jest-dom from 6.5.0 to 6.6.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/217
  • build(deps): bump framer-motion from 11.11.9 to 11.11.10 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/216
  • build(deps): bump @types/jest from 29.5.13 to 29.5.14 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/215
  • build(deps): bump @reduxjs/toolkit from 2.2.7 to 2.3.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/214

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.41.0 - Add highlight optional metrics and settings page
entry.content:
• Add highlight optional metrics on the backend and frontend (thanks to @modelorona)
  • Add settings screen to enable/disable the metrics (thanks to @modelorona)
  • Update libraries
    • [frontend] Gqlgen
    • [frontend] @graphql-codegen
    • [frontend] tailwindcss
    • [frontend] framer motion
    • [core] gqlparser
    • [frontend] @types/lodash
    • [frontend] @types/react
    • [frontend] @types/nodes
    • [frontend] redux tool kit
    • [core] mongodb driver
    • [frontend] testing library jest

What's Changed

  • fix small filter bug + add contact form option by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/184
  • modify how the server starts + stops as to allow for better flexibility in releasing resources by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/185
  • build(deps): bump @types/node from 22.5.4 to 22.7.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/183
  • build(deps): bump framer-motion from 11.5.4 to 11.9.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/182

  • add tentative highlight metrics + setting screen by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/187
  • build(deps): bump @testing-library/jest-dom from 6.5.0 to 6.6.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/217

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.42.0 - Fix response viewer bug & redesign logic page
entry.content:
• Remove card layout on the login page for a cleaner look
  • Fix raw execute response viewer to keep cache of submitted code and show table on select queries (case insensitive check)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.39.0...0.42.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.43.0 - Fix scan and update issue for MySQL & MariaDB
entry.content:
• [core] add backticks to be part of the conditions (Issue: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/issues/230)
  • [core] Buffio has some issues with scanning due to limits. Change the logic to support larger texts (Issue: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/issues/231)

What's Changed

  • Fix typos by @szepeviktor in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/234
  • build(deps): bump github.com/elastic/go-elasticsearch/v8 from 8.15.0 to 8.16.0 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/241
  • build(deps): bump @highlight-run/react from 6.0.4 to 7.0.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/240
  • build(deps): bump web-vitals from 4.2.3 to 4.2.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/219
  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.55 to 0.17.56 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/237
  • build(deps): bump uuid from 10.0.0 to 11.0.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/236
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/typescript-operations from 4.2.3 to 4.3.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/221
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/cli from 5.0.2 to 5.0.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/220

New Contributors

  • @szepeviktor made their first contribution in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/234

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.42.0...0.43.0
